entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:58 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
